The first enemy that ends their movement adjacent to you this round suffers a wound.

abilities.name: Trap

items.name: Mirror Of Envy
items.rules: Mirror Of Envy gear witchcraft During any town phase, you may declare an item that you or an ally owns.  From that point onwards, the 'Mirror Of Envy' mimicks that item and works exactly like the copied item.

items.name: Mithril Chainmail
items.rules: Mithril Chainmail armor medium Add (Power Die) to defense.  Gain +2 speed.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.    Add the below spending options to defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: Necklace Of Binding
items.rules: Necklace Of Binding gear necklace magical At the beginning of each adventure, declare an armor or weapon that you wear.    As you wear it, it becomes immune to faults and adds (White Die) to corresponding rolls (to rolls it already adds benefits to).

items.name: Necklace of War
items.rules: Necklace of War gear necklace magical Add the below spending options to attacks. Star: Cooldown -2. Star: Cause 'Knockback (1)'. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Novice Robes
items.rules: Novice Robes armor light magical Add (Blessing Die) to spellcasting.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power, but the armor suffers a fault.

items.name: Orb Of Refreshment
items.rules: Orb Of Refreshment gear witchcraft You may spend 2 movement points to put one token on this item (max. 5).  At any time, you may spend 3 such tokens to end the cooldown of any one's ability card.

items.name: Peasant's Garment
items.rules: Peasant's Garment armor light Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending option on defense. Surge: +1 Power, but the armor suffers a fault.

items.name: Pitchfork
items.rules: Pitchfork 2h weapon melee polearm hand You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: +3 Power.

items.name: Potent Healing Potion
items.rules: Potent Healing Potion consumable potion Consume to heal two wounds from yourself.

items.name: Power Cube
items.rules: Power Cube gear magical At the end of each turn, reduce one of your cooldowns by 1.

items.name: Primitive Bow
items.rules: Primitive Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 4  Add (Blessing Die) to attacks.

items.name: Purifying Elixir
items.rules: Purifying Elixir consumable potion Consume to end up to two of your ongoing negative effects.

items.name: Quarterstaff
items.rules: Quarterstaff 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain 'Reach'.  Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to spellcasting and attacks.

items.name: Quiver
items.rules: Quiver gear back Add (Blessing Die) to ranged attacks.    You may use the below spending options on ranged attacks. Surge: Cooldown -1.

items.name: Reaper's Axe
items.rules: Reaper's Axe 1h weapon melee slashing magical hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Add (Cursed Die) to melee defense.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +2 Power. Star: +2 Power. Surge: Heal one scratch from yourself.

items.name: Repeating Crossbow
items.rules: Repeating Crossbow 2h weapon ranged crossbow hand Range 6  Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.  Perform a free ranged attack at the end of each turn.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: +2 Power. Star: +1 Power.

items.name: Retrain
items.rules: Retrain consumable immediate Replace the default (Surge) spending option of your vessel with another one of your choice    OR    Change the learned perks of your vessel.

items.name: Ring Of Invulnerability
items.rules: Ring Of Invulnerability gear ring magical At the beginning of a round, you may activate this item, but only once per adventure.    You may then ignore any incoming scratches, wounds and negative effects during that round.

items.name: Ring Of Regeneration
items.rules: Ring Of Regeneration gear ring magical If you have an initiative of 2 or less, regenerate one scratch at the beginning of your turn.

items.name: Robe of the Mender
items.rules: Robe of the Mender armor light Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Whenever you perform the major action of a 'meta' type card, heal one scratch from an ally within range 2.

items.name: Round Shield
items.rules: Round Shield 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Star: +1 Power. Star: +1 Power. DoubleSurge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Royal Plate Armor
items.rules: Royal Plate Armor armor heavy Add (Power Die) to defense.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.(red##)  Move (1) before or after performing a major action.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Rune: Adamant
items.rules: Rune: Adamant rune armor Attach this to an armor.    Add (Blessing Die) to defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Drain
items.rules: Rune: Drain rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When killing an enemy, heal one scratch from yourself.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Enchant
items.rules: Rune: Enchant rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    Convert a (Blessing Die) it adds into an (Enhancement Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Focus
items.rules: Rune: Focus rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend one (Star) to reduce one of your cooldowns by 2.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Fortune
items.rules: Rune: Fortune rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may convert one botch into (Star).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Fuel
items.rules: Rune: Fuel rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may suffer 2 scratches to add (Power Die) (Blessing Die).    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Holy
items.rules: Rune: Holy rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend (Star) (Star) to heal 2 scratches from yourself. If you don't have any scratches, heal a wound instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Mark
items.rules: Rune: Mark rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, you may spend (Star) to cause 'Weaken'.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Rune: Protection
items.rules: Rune: Protection rune armor Attach this to an armor.    If the armor adds only one die or less to defense, add (Enhancement Die) to its defense.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Rage
items.rules: Rune: Rage rune armor Attach this to an armor.    You may set aside a (Star) from a defense roll and add it to your next attack.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Stoic
items.rules: Rune: Stoic rune armor Attach this to an armor.    You may spend (Surge) on defense to reduce the duration of a negative effect on you by 1.    Can only attach one rune per armor.

items.name: Rune: Void
items.rules: Rune: Void rune weapon Attach this to a tier 3 or lower weapon.    When attacking, count any rolled blanks as (Surge) instead.    Can only attach one rune per weapon.

items.name: Sacred Bead
items.rules: Sacred Bead consumable witchcraft Consume to grant yourself and all allies +2 power to all defense rolls for this round.

items.name: Scalemail Suit
items.rules: Scalemail Suit armor heavy Add (Power Die) to defense.  Add (Cursed Die) to attacks.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power. DoubleSurge: +1 Power.

items.name: Scroll Of Resurrection
items.rules: Scroll Of Resurrection consumable immediate Immediately get a vessel back that died during your last adventure. The original player who had it regains the perks that were already unlocked.

items.name: Scroll of the Ancients
items.rules: Scroll of the Ancients gear magical Once per adventure, by spending two movement points, you may cast any one spell (that exists in the game).  It automatically succeeds without any spendings.

items.name: Scythe
items.rules: Scythe 2h weapon melee polearm hand You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: Hit a third, adjacent enemy (deal max. one wound). DoubleSurge: Hit one additional, adjacent enemy (deal max. one wound).

items.name: Sell Soul Shard
items.rules: Sell Soul Shard consumable immediate Immediately obtain 20 gold coins.

items.name: Shield Of Reckoning
items.rules: Shield Of Reckoning 1h weapon shield hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Star: Perform a free melee attack against the attacker. Star: +1 Power. Surge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shield Of The Bulwark
items.rules: Shield Of The Bulwark 1h weapon shield hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: After determining the result, prevent one scratch. DoubleSurge: +5 Power, but the shield suffers a fault. Surge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shield Of The Templar
items.rules: Shield Of The Templar 1h weapon shield hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to defense and spellcasting.    Add the below spending options to defense. DoubleSurge: +3 Power. DoubleSurge: Reduce the cooldown of one of your cards with an interrupt effect by 1.

items.name: Shiv
items.rules: Shiv 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) to attacks.

items.name: Short Bow
items.rules: Short Bow 2h weapon ranged bow hand Range 5  Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Perform a free attack (max. 2 per round). Star: +1 Power.

items.name: Short Sword
items.rules: Short Sword 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.

items.name: Slate Of Fate
items.rules: Slate Of Fate consumable immediate You may play one additional adventure (to a max. of 4 per tier) in the current tier or any of the previous ones.  You may also re-attempt a failed adventure.

items.name: Sledgehammer
items.rules: Sledgehammer 2h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks.

items.name: Sorcerer's Focus
items.rules: Sorcerer's Focus gear necklace magical You may use the below spending options on spellcasting. Star: Reduce the cooldown of the spell by 1. Star: Reduce the target number to succeed at the spell by 1.

items.name: Soul Infusion
items.rules: Soul Infusion consumable immediate Immediately gain +1 XP for one player's soul to buy or upgrade ability cards.

items.name: Spear
items.rules: Spear 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain 'Reach'.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Surge: +1 Power. Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Spell Focus Staff
items.rules: Spell Focus Staff 1h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Surge) to each of your spellcasting rolls.    At the beginning of each adventure, declare a spell of yours. Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) when attempting that spell.

items.name: Spiked Mace
items.rules: Spiked Mace 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.  Add (Cursed Die) to defense against melee attacks.(red##)    You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: Cause 'Dazed'.

items.name: Staff Of Telekinesis
items.rules: Staff Of Telekinesis 2h weapon melee polearm hand Add (Power Die) to spellcasting.    Whenever you have played the minor or major action of a spell card, move any one model by 1 tile.

items.name: Studded Tunic
items.rules: Studded Tunic armor medium Add (Standard Die) (Blessing Die) to defense.    You may use the below spending options on defense. Surge: +1 Power.

items.name: Sword Of Flowing Water
items.rules: Sword Of Flowing Water 1h weapon melee blade magical hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Move (3) (gain 'Slippery) after the attack. Star: Move (1) (gain 'Slippery) after the attack.

items.name: Sword of the Executioner
items.rules: Sword of the Executioner 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Power Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Deal a wound. Star: +4 Power (if the enemy has taken at least 50% of its max. wounds). Surge: +2 Power.

items.name: Talisman
items.rules: Talisman consumable witchcraft Consume to end one of your ongoing effects.

items.name: Temporal Signet
items.rules: Temporal Signet gear ring magical Once per round, at the beginning of your turn, you may exchange one of your placed abilities with another one from your hand.

items.name: The All-Penetrating Eye
items.rules: The All-Penetrating Eye gear magical You may ignore the requirement of line-of-sight while casting a spell (range must still be fulfilled), but add (Cursed Die) to the roll.

items.name: The Tactician's Ring
items.rules: The Tactician's Ring gear ring After you have performed two minor actions during your turn, you may immediately allow an ally to play a major action from their hand.

items.name: Thief's Blade
items.rules: Thief's Blade 1h weapon melee blade hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    At the end of each turn, you may Move (3) (gain 'Nimble') in a straight or diagonal line and perform a free attack against one enemy that was within reach on that path.

items.name: Throwing Knives
items.rules: Throwing Knives 1h weapon ranged throwing hand Range 3  Doesn't have to be equipped to be used.    Add (Blessing Die) to attacks (if in backpack).  Add (Enhancement Die) to attacks (if in hand).

items.name: Tome Of Demons
items.rules: Tome Of Demons gear magical Your summoned minions gain +1 Power on all their attacks.

items.name: Vessel Core
items.rules: Vessel Core consumable immediate Immediately gain +1 XP for one player's vessel synchronization.

items.name: Volcano-tempered Helmet
items.rules: Volcano-tempered Helmet gear helmet You may prevent a wound by discarding this item.    You may use the below spending options on defense. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: War Axe
items.rules: War Axe 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.    Add (Cursed Die) (Cursed Die) to defense against melee attacks.(red##)

items.name: Wardancer's Spear
items.rules: Wardancer's Spear 2h weapon melee polearm hand Gain 'Reach'.  Add (Enhancement Die) (Enhancement Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. DoubleSurge: Hit an additional target within range. DoubleSurge: +2 Power.

items.name: Warhammer
items.rules: Warhammer 2h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Enhancement Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks.    You may use the below spending options on attacks. Star: Deal a wound and cause 'Knockback (2)'.

items.name: Weapon Oil
items.rules: Weapon Oil consumable mundane Consume to remove up to two faults from an item that you carry.

items.name: Whip Of The Succubus
items.rules: Whip Of The Succubus 1h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Enhancement Die) to your attacks.  Gain 'Reach'.    Add the below spending options to attacks. Surge: Cause 'Dazed'. Surge: Cause 'Stun'.

items.name: Whistleheart Axe
items.rules: Whistleheart Axe 2h weapon melee slashing hand Add (Power Die) to attacks.    Before rolling for an attack, you may add any amount of dice, but suffer 4 scratches in return.

items.name: Zweihaender
items.rules: Zweihaender 2h weapon melee blade hand Add (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) (Blessing Die) to attacks and melee defense.    You may use the below spending option on attacks and defense. Surge: +1 Power.
